CustomField.formula: CASE( Lead_Quality_Helper__c, 1, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1 star"), 2, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2 star"), 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 star"), 4, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 star"), 5, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 star"), IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "0 star"))
CustomField.label: Lead Quality
